name: Trapped in Nightmares - Test Level
description:
Trapped In Nightmares (test level) I added 8 directions of animations insted of 8, now you have a robot that follows the cursor to shoot.

Controllers:

  • WASD keys to move
  • Point with the mouse
  • Left click to shoot
  • (also when close to NPC) Left click to talk
  • Right Click to next dialogue
  • Espace to dash
  • ESC to Pause 
  • Press 'Q' to Change Weapon
